nodes.text: Rampa Rapids was a hyperspace trade route that linked R'alla to Rampa II.
This route was used by smugglers to supply Rampa II in water from nearby R'alla. It was strictly controlled by Corporate Sector Authority gunships of the Rampa Skywatch.

Smuggler Platt Okeefe found falsified cargo manifests for a run down the Rampa Rapids once while cleaning out the computer files of the ship. Han Solo, Chewbacca and Reck Desh once transported R'alla mineral water to Rampa II.
